introduction: Date of Birth	13 April 1992, Long Beach, California, USABirth Name	Emma Kristina DegerstedtNickname	EmHeight	5' 5" (1.65 m)Mini Bio (1)Emma Degerstedt was born on April 13, 1992 in Long Beach, California, USA as Emma Kristina Degerstedt. She is an actress, known for Unfabulous (2004), The Curious Case of Benjamin Button (2008) and The Big Bang Theory (2007).Trade Mark (1)Long blonde hairTrivia (4)She is Swedish and speaks Swedish with her grandparents.She has performed in over 20 musicals at Regional Theatres and Civic Light Operas.Has an older brother, his name is Mats.She is a student at UCLA majoring in Theater. [2010]Personal Quotes (1)One of my biggest role models is Mandy Moore. She is a remarkable singer and a very talented actress.
